tool_description: Delivers notifications to customers through multiple channels with delivery tracking and confirmation.

delivery_channels.description: Channels to use: email, sms, push, in_app

priority.description: Delivery priority: low, normal, high, urgent

schedule_delay_minutes.description: Minutes to delay delivery (0 for immediate)

error_messages: Invalid delivery channel: Use supported channels [email, sms, push, in_app].
Message content empty: Both message_subject and message_body are required.
Customer contact unavailable: No valid contact information found for specified delivery channels.
Delivery service unavailable: Notification system is temporarily unavailable.
Invalid schedule delay: schedule_delay_minutes must be between 0 and 1440 (24 hours).
usage: Provide account_id, message_subject, and message_body; optionally specify delivery_channels, priority, require_confirmation, and schedule_delay_minutes for advanced delivery options.

delivery_status.description: Overall delivery status: sent, pending, failed, scheduled

channels_attempted.description: List of delivery channels that were attempted

successful_deliveries.description: Number of successful deliveries across channels

delivery_timestamp.description: When notification was delivered or scheduled
